body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Have at least one charge counter on Umezawa's Jitte
2. Have at least 2 untapped mana.
3. Try to use Umezawa's Jittes ability to gain life in first or second main phase. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? To have all 4 buttons for the abilities (Equip, +2/+2, -1/-1, life +2), but the gain life button is not present. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.27 on WinXP SP3
